metadata.title: CVE-2022-0583 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Crash in the PVFS protocol dissector in Wireshark 3.6.0 to 3.6.1 and 3.4.0to 3.4.11 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capturefile

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
